name: Mega Casanova
overview: This is a port of the j2me game "Casanova Jr.: Girl on Girl" to the 16-bit game console Sega Mega Drive / Genesis. In essence, this is a visual novel dedicated to the adventures of the modern "Casanova". There is no pornography in the game (demonstrations of what is under the panties), only erotica. There are 2 languages to choose from: English and Russian. Unlike the original game, the port has a number of differences: additional scenes, additional melodies from Russian pop music of the 1990s.
